column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2

#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent

#Text=The FCP Will insist that there be no cover-up of information related to the transmission of viruses , the link between abortion and breast cancer and the inadequacy of condoms against some viruses .

#Text=The Family Coalition party would create a responsible free enterprise climate , with government intervention limited to the enforcement of the entrepreneur ’s responsibilities in such areas as work safety and protection .
#Text=It would reform the school system to prepare young people for assuming the challenge of change and responsibility for innovation , to create a vibrant economy in Ontario .
#Text=We will help the private sector to create jobs by reducing taxes to stimulate investment and increase the buying power of the average citizen .
#Text=People must keep in mind a quote from my own mother when speaking to a grade eight graduating class years ago : The world owes you nothing if you contribute nothing .

#Text=The Family Coalition Party will require a person ’s juvenile record to be released upon the first adult conviction and will require a person who is convicted of a violent offence for which he/she has been previously convicted to serve the balance of the previous unserved sentence .
#Text=In addition the maximum sentence for the current conviction will be doubled , without possibility for parole .
#Text=We believe that no person living below the poverty line should pay taxes .

#Text=The Family Coalition Party will restore freedom of speech of pro-life individuals or groups , including their freedom to demonstrate peacefully in front of hospitals , abortion clinics or any other place of their choice .
#Text=In addition , The Family Coalition Party will urge the federal government to restore full legal protection to all human beings , from the moment of conception to natural death .
#Text=What should be the first order of business in the 39th Legislative Assembly ?

#Text=The first order of business in the 39th Legislative Assembly should be , in accordance with the wishes of the people from across Canada as demonstrated in a recent pole , to put an end to abortion .
#Text=The public is also concerned with job loss and crime in our streets .
#Text=Are the property taxes in your riding at a fair level for the amount of services received in the municipality ?

#Text=The Family Coalition Party would cut taxes by reducing the budgets of all government Agencies , Boards and Commissions by 10 % the first year and initiate a review the second year with a view of eliminating as many of them as possible .
#Text=How can the province lead the way in stimulating job creation ?
#Text=The decision to index support payment programs to inflation was a positive move made by the 38th Legislative Assembly , but left most recipients still short of what they need to live .
#Text=The health tax was a heavy burden placed on low income members of society .
